The Obsolete Book

in a Post-Obsolete World, as Represented by a Post-Obsolete Book About Dance

A performable website in the spirit (and tutelage) of Michelle Ellsworth – with text-to-speech voice-over, transparencies, party hats, diagrams, whiskey, handouts, and music by The Widow’s Bane.

Follow your bliss, Mia. Take no prisoners. We’re already dead. What the fuck do we want with money?

—Mortimer Leech

Thank you Mr. Leech.

The piece requires a few props:

  • overhead projector
  • party hats
  • noise makers
  • an old book about dance
  • 10-page printed handouts
  • tweed jacket
  • whiskey
